    FormEnum(FieldText field)
    Build a form enumerator from an alix FieldText, sharing properties useful to calcultate scores for some queries : Dictionary of forms FieldCharsAbstract.dic docsByform[formId] = docs; count of docs by form FieldCharsAbstract.docsByForm. Σ docsByForm; global count of docs relevant for this field FieldAbstract.docsAll. occsByform[formId] = occs; count of occurrences by form occsByForm. Σ occsByForm; global count of occs for this field occsAll.
